name: edapt-data-handler
description: EDAPT = Email-Data Assistant & Processor Tool: A Web-App for Data Ingestion via Email and Data Viewing & Downloading via Website

scripts.install-web-app: npm run install-web-app-top && npm run install-web-client && npm run install-web-server
scripts.install-all: npm run install-top && npm run install-database-api && npm run install-email-handler && npm run install-web-app
scripts.dev: node edapt-mode.js && cd web-app && npm run dev
scripts.dev-demo: node edapt-mode.js demo && cd web-app && npm run dev-demo
scripts.build-prod: node edapt-mode.js && cd web-app && npm run build
scripts.build-demo: node edapt-mode.js demo && cd web-app && npm run build
scripts.serve-dev: node edapt-mode.js && cd web-app && npm run serve-dev
scripts.serve-demo: node edapt-mode.js demo && cd web-app && npm run serve-demo
scripts.serve-prod-test: node edapt-mode.js && cd web-app && npm run serve-prod-test
scripts.serve-prod: node edapt-mode.js && cd web-app && npm run serve-prod
